landingPage.title: 👋 I'm Adrian Pike
landingPage.bio: I am a Full Stack Developer with expertise in building end-to-end web applications using modern technologies like React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Skilled in both front-end and back-end development, with a strong focus on performance, scalability, and user experience. Proven ability to deliver high-quality solutions in fast-paced, agile environments.

bachelorBegin.title: Full Stack Developer – TechNova Solutions
bachelorBegin.description: Leading the development of a cloud-based project management platform using React, Node.js, and AWS. Designed and implemented RESTful APIs and optimized front-end components for performance and responsiveness. Collaborated with UI/UX designers and DevOps engineers to streamline CI/CD pipelines and reduce deployment time by 40%.

androidDsGroup.title: Software Engineer – ByteForge Labs
androidDsGroup.description: Built a scalable e-commerce web app using Next.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, supporting real-time inventory tracking and secure payments. Integrated third-party APIs for shipping and tax calculation, and implemented unit and integration tests to ensure code reliability. Improved page load speed by 30% through code splitting and lazy loading strategies.

flutterDsGroup.title: Junior Full Stack Developer – CloudNest Technologies
flutterDsGroup.description: Contributed to the development of an internal dashboard system for analytics and reporting using Angular, .NET Core, and SQL Server. Created reusable front-end components and implemented role-based access control for enterprise clients. Participated in daily scrums, code reviews, and deployed updates in an agile workflow.

afse.title: Marvel Stickers Collection
afse.description: Discover a web application built entirely with vanilla JavaScript, developed for a university exam. This app allows users to collect, buy, and trade Marvel stickers. The frontend is powered by a custom framework I created to ensure a smooth Single Page Application (SPA) experience, providing seamless navigation. Enjoy an intuitive interface for managing your collection and engaging in trades with others.

portfolio.title: Personal portfolio
portfolio.description:
Explore my portfolio built with Next.js and styled using Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI.
I have focused on both server-side and client-side rendering optimizations to ensure fast load times and high performance. The interface is modern and consistent, designed to highlight my skills, projects, and professional experience.
It follows Google’s mobile-first indexing guidelines and accessibility best practices.
